data.title: Payment Options
data.meta_description: Paying your bill by EFT or Web is a win-win for the customer and the Utility. These methods save you time and money and help us keep your rates low because...
data.text:
It’s the most convenient solution! Nothing to mail, no check to write, no stamp to buy. Automatic electronic funds transfers from your bank account are safe and easy to set up. This method not only saves you time and money, it ensures that you will never have to pay another late penalty.

Enroll for Automatic Bank Draft – EFT Pay

Access our secure site to pay your bill online. Your payment registers on our system immediately. You can also view your account history on the same site, see your consumption, view past payments, and/or leave messages for our staff.

Access Web Pay

To pay your bill by mail, make your check or money order out to Peru Utilities and send it to Peru Utilities at P. O. Box 67, Peru, IN 46970. Be sure to use the envelope and stub that came with your bill. Allow extra time for postal service delivery, and never send cash.

To pay your bill in person or to meet with a customer service representative, come to our main office at 335 East Canal Street in Peru.

Customer service representatives are available during office hours to take credit card payments over the phone. (However, we recommend that customers make credit card payments via Web Pay.)
